title: When repenting don't feel remorse for few seconds then come back Is repentance valid assim al hakeem
transcript: I have a question so if I Repent from doing uh something bad and while repenting um I do get remorse but like that after a couple of minutes there is a period of like maybe if there's a period of like 10 seconds where I feel like I don't have remorse not that I like want to do it again but I don't have the burning feeling in my heart and if I but after that the remorse comes back like there are periods where the remorse goes away would my repentance be valid yes your repentance is valid and such a short gap of feeling No Remorse has no impact on the validity of your repentance it's just shatan messing up with your head ignore it and keep on asking Allah for forgiveness and Allah will forgive you
